#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
float a[60],debtf;
int aa[60],debt;
int i,j,t,m,num,x,no,n,mm,sce;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	scanf("%d",&t);
	no = 1;
	while(t--)
	{
	scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
	for(i = 0;i<n;i++)
	{
	scanf("%f",&a[i]);
	aa[i]= a[i]*100.0+0.2;
	}
	sce = 1;
	std::sort(aa,aa+n);
	//for(int g=0;g<n;g++)
	//printf("%d ",aa[g]);
	printf("Case %d:\n",no);
	while(m--)
	{
	printf("Scenario %d:\n",sce);
	 scanf("%f",&debtf);
	 debt = debtf*100.0+0.2;
	 mm =n-1;
	 while(debt>=1)
	 {
	 //printf("%d ",debt);
	 if(debt == aa[mm])
	  {
	  if(aa[mm] <100)
	  { float g = (aa[mm]*1.00)/100;
	    printf("%.2f %d\n",g,1);
	   
	   } else
	    {
	  
	    x = aa[mm]/100;
	     printf("%d %d\n",x,1);
	    }
	    debt = 0;
	  }
	  
	  else if(debt>aa[mm])
	   {
	    
	    num = debt/aa[mm];
	    if(aa[mm]<100)
	   {
	   float g =(aa[mm]*1.00)/100; 
	   printf("%.2f %d\n",g,num);
	   
	   }
	   else
	    
	    {
	    x = aa[mm]/100;
	    printf("%d %d\n",x,num);
	   
	   }
	   debt = debt - aa[mm] * num;
	   mm--;
	   
	   }
	   else 
	 mm--;
	 
	 }
	sce++;
	}
	
	
	
	no++;
	}
	return 0;
}
